Title: Directory Traversal
Description: `elding` is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, allowing an attacker to access the filesystem by placing "../" in the url. /nThe files accessible, however, are limited to files with a file extension. Sending a `GET` request to `/../../../etc/passwd`, for example, will return a on etc/passwd/index.js.
Solution: There is no solution for this vulnerability at the moment.
